name: I smel cat grill
description:
Melon Tusk has kidnapped the cat gril! Join our paladins in the quest to bring her back!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Attack

This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam #142 - https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-142

Week 142 Theme: 'Mischief'

Programming - Lorespo

Lead Character Artist - Lallo

Cat Girl Character Artist - Sforgat

Environment Artist - Getopreido

SFX Artist - Lallo

Cat Girl Voice Actress - [redacted]

Composer - Max P. Drawer
